title: Straccetti Con Rucola E Funghi
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Straccetti Con Rucolan E Funghi a try. This recipe makes 2 servings with 640 calories, 49g of protein, and 47g of fat each. For $6.24 per serving, this recipe covers 32% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 2 people were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 24 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal diet. A mixture of olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. To use up the balsamic vinegar you could follow this main course with the Skinny Strawberry Ice Cream as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 84%. This score is great. Try Insalata Di Rucola, Insalata Di Rucolan E Pera, and Arugula Salad (Insalata di Rucola) for similar recipes.
